author: Joshua Fluke
description:

CEOs on LinkedIn are officially losing the plot.

In this episode of “Things You’d Only Say If You’ve Never Applied for a Job”, we’ve got CEOs proposing some truly galaxy-brain ideas:

Pay to apply for a job (but don’t call it discrimination)

A fast-pass hiring system where $50 might earn your resume eye contact
CEOs threatening to record and publicly shame people who reject cold calls
Charging candidates a month’s salary if they accept an offer… and change their mind
Gatekeeping job seekers for applying “too broadly”
Disqualif
title: CEOS ARE CRASHING OUT HARD ON LINKEDIN! (PAY TO APPLY TO A JOB!?)
